00006 #ifndef CUPP_kernel_type_binding_H
00007 #define CUPP_kernel_type_binding_H
00008 
00009 #include <boost/type_traits.hpp>
00010 
00011 namespace cupp {
00012 
00022 // these are the default trait for all types which require no special treatment
00023 // they will remove any cv qualified and any reference
00024 // int -> int
00025 template <typename device_type>
00026 class kernel_host_type {
00027         public:
00028                 typedef device_type type;
00029 };
00030 
00031 // T&  -> T
00032 template <typename device_type>
00033 class kernel_host_type<device_type&> {
00034         public:
00035                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_reference<device_type>::type>::type type;
00036 };
00037 
00038 // const T& -> T&
00039 template <typename device_type>
00040 class kernel_host_type<device_type const> {
00041         public:
00042                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_const<device_type>::type>::type type;
00043 };
00044 
00045 // volatile T -> T
00046 template <typename device_type>
00047 class kernel_host_type<device_type volatile> {
00048         public:
00049                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_volatile<device_type>::type>::type type;
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00062 // these are the default trait for all types which require no special treatment
00063 // they will remove any cv qualified and any reference
00064 // int -> int
00065 template <typename host_type>
00066 class kernel_device_type {
00067         public:
00068                 typedef host_type type;
00069 };
00070 
00071 // T&  -> T
00072 template <typename host_type>
00073 class kernel_device_type<host_type&> {
00074         public:
00075                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_reference<host_type>::type>::type type;
00076 };
00077 
00078 // const T& -> T&
00079 template <typename host_type>
00080 class kernel_device_type<host_type const> {
00081         public:
00082                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_const<host_type>::type>::type type;
00083 };
00084 
00085 // volatile T -> T
00086 template <typename host_type>
00087 class kernel_device_type<host_type volatile> {
00088         public:
00089                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<typename boost::remove_volatile<host_type>::type>::type type;
00090 };
00091 
00092 } // cupp
00093 
00094 #endif //CUPP_kernel_call_traits_H
